A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was amazing I grew up watching these movies and this one definitely did not disappoint. I really like all of the different relationships and dinamics between all of the characters a lot. To me it's like reliving part of my childhood and brings back so many great memories of these characters I have loved my whole life. I have seen a lot of people giving bad reviews of this movie and it really bothers me so do yourself a favor don't listen or read them just go watch this movie with an open mind and enjoy the ride. We live in a generation of to many critics and not enough creative people.
